description: Be part of our team! Oowlish is one of the fastest software development companies in LatAm. description: FTX is a leading cryptocurrency exchange built by traders for traders with headquarters in Nassau, The Bahamas. FTX offers innovative products including industry-first derivatives, options, volatility products and leveraged tokens. We strive to develop a platform robust enough for professional trading firms and intuitive enough for first-time users. We are looking for talented individuals to join our fast paced team! We are looking for a content professional who has solid knowledge of SEO and track record of applying it on content marketing initiatives. The ideal candidate is in tune with the cryptocurrency industry and passionate about delivering quality content to the public; you are versatile, a strong communicator and collaborator, and able to write and edit clear, concise copy on tight deadlines. In this role you will participate in the development and creation of the content strategy, and the development and delivery of content across organic channels while ensuring quality and consistency. You will aim to drive traffic, engagement, and leads that deliver new users. You will create, develop, edit, proofread and manage content through internal web and legal review process, ensuring it upholds the brand’s tone, voice and style. In this exciting opportunity, you work closely with the Content, Product Marketing, and Business Units to define and drive product and educational narratives.
title: Content Manager

description: <p><strong>Opera is looking for a talented and driven Graphic Design Intern to join our Gaming Division’s Marketing team!<strong><br><p> <p>Visual Designers at Opera work side by side with our Creative Lead, Marketing Directors and Product Managers in order to visually express our brand in a consistent and effective manner. <p> <p><strong> Responsibilities<strong><p> <ul><li>Create visual assets for Marketing, Advertising and Social campaigns<li><li>Create content for social media, presentation decks and infographics<li><li>Brief and project manage external design agencies<li><li>Collaborate on setting the visual identity of the Opera’s gaming brands<li><ul> <p><strong>Requirements<strong><p> <ul><li>In final year of, or recently completed graphic design degree or equivalent<li><li>Passion for video games and knowledge of the gaming industry<li><li>Strong type and graphic design skills<li><li>Thorough experience creating graphicsillustrations using Figma or Sketch<li><li>Some knowledge of motion design (After Effects or other) is a plus<li><li>Good knowledge of touching up photos using PhotoshopLightroom<li><li>Fluent oral and written communication skills in English<li><ul> <p>This is a part-time paid position. <p> <p><strong>How to apply:<strong><p> <ul><li>For immediate consideration, apply online. <li><li><u><strong>Please include links to portfolio on: Behance, Dribbble or Instagram<strong><u><li><ul> <p><strong>About Opera<strong><p> <p><em>Opera is a global web innovator with an engaged and growing base of hundreds of millions of monthly active users who seek a better internet experience. Building on over 25 years of innovation that started with browser products, Opera is now leveraging its brand and highly engaged user base in order to expand its business into new segments. Today, Opera offers users around the world a range of products and services that include PC and mobile browsers, the newsreader Opera News, and apps dedicated to gaming, crypto, e-commerce and classifieds. In 2018, Opera introduced the first browser with a built-in crypto wallet and web3 support. <em><p> <p><em>Opera is headquartered in Oslo, Norway and listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange (OPRA).<em><p>

description: The Future of Commerce Is Collaborative. We are the infrastructure for collaborative, inclusive and equitable commerce; combining the physical and digital world seamlessly. Decommerce is a protocol that enables brands to send marketing funds directly to their communities, instead of big tech companies. Decommerce dApps enable brands to engage, co-create with and compensate their consumers for contributions directly on their existing web shop stack. We are looking for our Head of Community to spread the word, build community and manage day-to-day aspects of the Decommerce community leading up to the public token listing and beyond. The ideal candidate will be highly proactive, organized, adaptive, and reliable, a master of Crypto Twitter and Discord, with outstanding communication skills, a knack for developing personal relationships, and proven experience building web3 communities. Your responsibility: community • Define and execute on the $DECOM community strategy with the leadership team across all channels, including realistic yet ambitious KPIs • Build, maintain and promote a vibrant community culture on Discord and other community channels • Compile regular digests of Decommerce updates and other news relevant to pre-public markets, and communicate these to our community via all channels, e.g. Discord, Twitter, $DECOM community forum, mailing list, and other social media channels • Continuously monitor our social media channels, and engage meaningfully with both our community and the wider crypto community as a representative of Decommerce • Act as a bridge to relay back critical feedback and pain points back to the team • Provide insights and guidance to the leadership team on market development, community requirements, and competitive analysis • Actively seek out and organize potential community building opportunities, including collaborations, features in media outlets, speaking opportunities, and advertising opportunities, and maintain these relationships • Organize and host regular community calls and other community events • Represent Decommerce at virtual and in-person conferences and hackathons • Manage a monthly marketing budget • Plan, execute, and iterate upon community engagementgrowth campaigns with an experimental and analytical approach • Help scale and manage a team of community moderators and managers What we are looking for: • Eagerness and openness to building something radically new • Hands-on experience and a keen interest in the web3 and crypto industry • Hands-on experience and track record of generating cross-channel community growth • Hands-on experience with cross-channel marketing and the latest trends in advertising • Hands-on experience in delivering on growth targets and handling marketing budgets • In-depth knowledge of the landscape, trends, and players in the web3 andor e-commerce industry What we offer: • Pioneer work: no venture has done what we are building and you are asked to apply your knowledge and experience to further develop the Decommerce vision • Fulfilling work: our massive transformative purpose is to empower creators, consumers and create opportunities for every person with an internet connection • Compensation: Early Team Member package, including $DECOM token compensation with significant upside • Flexibility: the option of getting paid in digital currency • Growth: we’re growing very fast and are looking to scale further • Pace: you’ll get to join the fast train in a new way of doing things • Flexibility: you choose when and from where you work - as long as the work gets delivered • Instant feedback: community-led business is based on non-stop, instantaneous, and iterative AB testing through collaboration with our own brand (community of 400,000 people) • People: tier-1 international and diverse team across 8 locations on 4 continents. We are selective – and only work with the best in their field • Location: we’re a global team, all working remotely and strongly together. In the process of creating hubs in selected locations About Decommerce Decommerce is a web2<>web3 commerce infrastructure protocol for brands to engage, co-create with and compensate their consumers for contributions directly via their existing web shop stack. Contributions can be community engagement, product co-creation and customer acquisition work. More at decommerce.com.
title: Head of Community

description: We’re opening the world’s first physical retail, educational, and community space dedicated to Web3. Our mission is to introduce and onboard people to Web3 and the Solana ecosystem, and we couldn’t do this without hiring the best. We’re a small team of dedicated builders who are deeply passionate about educating new users and Web3 natives alike. We are inspired by innovation and can’t wait to show our friends and family (but we also don’t take ourselves too seriously). We’re looking for a self-motivated Director of Programming & Events to develop and maintain a programming strategy which will result in culturally relevant Web3 IRL spaces continuously filled with engaged guests. You will own the entire process from concept & planning through execution and reporting. Our ideal candidate will thrive in the fast paced, ever-changing world of Web3. The tech is moving at warp speed, and we’ll need people who embrace change and are ready to pivot. We’re looking for candidates with an optimistic attitude (wagmi) who are excited about the future and understand that Web3, blockchain, Crypto, DeFi, and NFTs are all a part of it. More about you: You are an engaging, positive person. You’re ready to live in the future and are determined that no one gets left behind. You’re never tired of learning. You are regularly willing and are excited about learning about new protocols, DeFi, NFTs, and Web3. Maintain positive relationships with our third party partners and vendors Establish and maintain strong relationships with leaders and corporate partners Negotiate contracts and manage relationships with outside vendors Responsibilities: Develop and design templates for events that can be scaled across different cities Concept innovative programming with a focus on evangelizing Solana and it’s ecosystem to a non-crypto audience Build a curriculum for Web3 education across a variety of Web3 topics such as DeFi, NFTs, DAOs and more Identify concepts and opportunities to bring to leadership and our partners Produce a seamless run of show with project timelines and shared tracking Plan all aspects of events cross functionally with operations, retail staff, marketing, partnerships, and others as needed to bring your vision to life Network with communities to discover talent for panels and events Manage relationships with vendors and partners for each event and produce partner recaps that provides quantifiable results Maintain & publish a customer facing programming calendar Forecast revenue, manage budgets efficiently, and produce ROI analysis reports to achieve business goals Coordinate content and schedule for corporate education events Develop a strategy to promote events across relevant channels such as Twitter, Discord and Partner communities Requirements: Motivated by our mission to bring Web3 and Solana to the masses 5+ years of experience in event coordination and planning 1+ years personal or professional experience with Web3, blockchain or Crypto Proven experience delivering measurable event ROI Ability to effectively speak about our mission, Web3, Solana, wallets, NFTs, and other blockchain innovation to large groups and media Experience negotiating with vendors and talent Ability to travel up to 30% of the time Skills: Highly organized Articulate and strong communication skills Problem solving in real time Creative Strong understanding of Web3 culture Attention to design and creative Thrive in a fast pace environment You are a multi-tasker with attention to details Location: Ideally based in Miami or New York but open to nearby locations for the right candidate with the ability to travel to these locations for events as needed. More about Solana: Solana is a high-speed single layer blockchain designed to scale to a billion users. It allows fast and cheap transactions on the network coupled with censorship resistance enabling developers to build slick and powerful applications. The project was founded in early 2017 and went live in March 2020. Since then it has seen unprecedented growth attracting millions of users, and thousands of applications that have been developed by entrepreneurs from all over the world. Comp: starting at $125k

title: Senior Engineering Manager

description: Founded in 2018, with employees across the world, The Block is the leading research, analysis, and news brand in the digital asset space. The Block's team is spread across 5 continents and 15+ time zones, covering the global cryptocurrency space 247. At The Block, we see digital assets as a ubiquitous part of the future. As this space continues to evolve, we view our role as the trusted moderator and authoritative voice for those who invest in, work with, make decisions about, or seek to understand digital assets. The Block delivers deep insight into how the emerging digital assets sector interacts with traditional finance, technology, governments, and markets. We reach hundreds of thousands of technologists, financial market participants, Fortune 500 professionals, global service providers, policymakers, and more through our main website, dedicated Research Portal, podcast, and events. You will be responsible for developing new data offerings, developing and supporting solutions for product analytics, and capturing feedback from our logging and debugging services to both troubleshoot and make improvements. An effective Data Engineer should be able to effectively communicate with the Product & Engineering team while developing ETL pipelines that support our data and analytics product efforts. The ideal candidate must be able to prioritize tasks and complete them in a timely manner. Who We Are: The culture of The Block lies in our key behaviors. It’s who we are and it’s how we show up every day. We are confidently humble. We jump in and roll up our sleeves. We know there’s always more to learn and we operate without egos. We are actionably curious. We strive to be an expert in our field and always seek opportunities to expand our knowledge and skill set. We put our learnings into practice every day.  We practice tenacious ownership. Every day when we show up we are contributors, teammates, and owners. We rotate through those three hats with agility and without sacrificing accountability or consistency. We practice respectful partnership. We treat others as we’d expect to be treated - with respect, concern, understanding, and patience. Why You Should Work Here: We take care of our employees and we have the benefits and perks to support it. Our full-time, US-based employees are eligible for Unlimited PTO, remote-first environment, high health plan employer contributions, monthly wellness stipend, generous parental leave policy, 401k match, fitness partnerships, fertility benefits, One Medical membership, and citibike membership.  We’re a remote-first company which allows us to hire the best person for the job regardless of location.  Impactful work. Regardless of your role at The Block, you’re making a meaningful contribution to our mission in accelerating the evolution of financial systems through independent reporting and technical research of all projects influencing the future of financial services. What Else Should You Know? The Block is an equal employment opportunity employer.  Qualified candidates are considered for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, military or veteran status, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. During our application process, we collect completely anonymous diversity information. Providing this information is voluntary but we want you to know what we do with it. We use the data to ensure that our recruiting practices are bringing diverse talent to the organization and we are reacting where we are coming up short. We strive to use the data to ensure we have the tools and resources for all employees both during the interview process and should those employees choose to join us at The Block.
title: Data Engineer Contract

description: Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money. Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world? We are looking for a Senior Product Manager to join our growing Know Your Customer (KYC) team. Our mission is to help customers onboard fast and safely to Binance, in a trustworthy and delightful way. You’ll transform ideas into strategy and product features, following our development processes to deliver the final product from start to finish. To succeed in this role, you should be a data driven, creative leader and problem-solver with a passion for the crypto industry. This person must be based in Switzerland. Working at Binance • Do something meaningful; Be a part of the future of finance technology and the no.1 company in the industry • Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems • International work environment and flat organisation • Great career development opportunities in a growing company • Possibility for relocation and international transfers mid-career • Competitive salary • Flexible working hours, Casual work attire
title: Product Manager - KYC/KYB - Switzerland based

description: About MRGN Labs: MRGN Labs believes in an accessible, decentralized future. We build scalable infrastructure projects on Solana with an eye towards DeFi applications. We’re actively contributing to marginfi, the margin protocol for trading across Solana. It unifies the trading experience across markets through mechanisms that automate margin management and maximize capital efficiency. marginfi is designed for sophisticated traders and has an exciting roadmap that will unlock complex trading strategies in the Solana ecosystem. Our team consists of experienced professionals with backgrounds in quantitative research, machine learning, robotics, cybersecurity, digital identity, data science, MLOps, and DevOps. We’re an early-stage startup with a flat organizational structure and a need for speed. Who We’re Looking for: We are seeking a senior software engineer to be a core part of the team. Set the standard for a nascent codebase and set the stage for more secure, usable, and comprehensive financial products on Solana. We are looking for someone who is excited to build from the ground up, who believes in open source code, and who has conviction that globally accessible markets will change the world for the better. The Opportunity: Lead the development and design of the Marginfi web platform. Collaborate with leading ecosystem projects. Implement and perform testing to ensure system stability Drive a focused engineering culture and set the stage for best practices in DeFi Preferred Qualifications: Proficiency with mobile platform level languages like Typescript  React  Nodejs. Disciplined approach to software design and building that yields maintainable code with low assumptions. Eye for aesthetics and the ability to transform complex interfaces into a user experiences that empower the user. Belief in the benefits of open source contribution. Passion for software development, DeFi, and cryptocurrencies. Experience using trading platforms. Benefits: Extremely competitive salary and benefits 100% employer-paid health insurance for you and all of your dependents (health PPO, dental, vision) Wellness benefits & workspace  equipment budget A focused, driven team to get you pumped every day

description: Syndica is a developer infrastructure company building the cloud of web3. We are dedicated to building developer infrastructure that just works. Syndica offers highly scalable RPC node infrastructure, with advanced logging and analytics. Our team is composed of the brightest crypto-native minds from places like Messari and 0x Labs as well as traditional technology firms like Facebook, AWS, Microsoft, and more. We are backed by strategic partners, investors, and advisors who are all-in on our mission: Chamath of Social Capital, Sam Bankman-Fried of Alameda Research, Solana Ventures, and many more. At Syndica, big things happen. Every day, we’re translating vision into reality by tackling new and exciting challenges head-on. This is a breakthrough stage in our company, and you’ll experience firsthand the infectious enthusiasm of our employees and leadership team. You’ll have the opportunity to learn new skills, grow your career, and work with the smartest, most passionate people in crypto. This role will have the primary accountability of designing, implementing, and operating Syndica’s developer platform. ReactTypescript and some Go knowledge is a necessity! The team operates with a “run what you write” philosophy and each engineer is responsible for deploying and operating the code they write. A successful candidate must have demonstrable experience in at least one programming language (preferably JavascriptTypescript), and previous work in frontend and some backend (NodeJSGo) application development. You will be working closely with the product and engineering team on creating great developer tools and APIs on our platform. The ideal candidate will also have prior experience developing applications with strong focus on UIUXDX. Responsibilities Design, mock, and implement beautiful UIUX Ensure product features are built to specification Write beautiful, extensible and maintainable code (we only use Typescript on frontend). Responsible for testing and deploying frontend and some backend services Administer the state of components in our cloud related to the platform Monitor platform for any downtime and respond accordingly Collaborate with other engineers to implement operational solutions while defining and adhering to industry best practices Qualifications 2+ years related professional experience 2 to 5 years as a fullstack developer Strong experience with ReactJavascriptTypescript and NodeJSGo Experience with JestMocha Configuration of CICD pipelines Experience working in a highly distributed company is a plus Align a portion of your day with the business hours of Central Time Zone - UTC -6 Working knowledge of information security issues Systematic problem-solving approach, combined with a strong sense of ownership and drive Firm grasp of at least one modern programming language, beyond advanced scripting (Shell or Python) Experience writing automation tools & eagerness to "automate all the things" What does success in this role look like? In three months, you have become our go-to fullstack developer working on important developerplatform features delivering at great speeds. You’ll have taken on independent code review responsibilities and are collaborating on the design of new features In six months, you have earned the trust of the team and are delivering tasks through the entire SDLC, from design through development with minimal guidance, and are helping to effectively mentor new engineers joining the team In twelve months, you have established a cadence of predictable, on-time delivery without cutting corners

description: About Maple Developed to solve the inefficiencies seen in traditional systems, Maple brings the corporate credit market 100% on-chain using smart contracts to remove time and cost frictions, and executed on blockchains for immutability.    Maple Finance is infrastructure for experts (pool delegates) to run on-chain lending businesses, and have three core customers Borrowers, Lenders and Pool Delegates. Maple offers Borrowers transparent, capital-efficient financing. For Lenders, Maple offers a sustainable yield source through lending to diversified pools of crypto’s premium institutions. Loans are managed and underwritten by sophisticated teams of credit analysts called Pool Delegates, who assess credit-worthiness and set loan terms with Borrowers.   The Team Today the Maple team is 40+ strong, with staff from BlockFi, Kraken, Meta, Bank of America, Gemini and MakerDAO to name just a few blue-chip orgs. Team profiles are shared on our site here! Remote in USA The Role The Capital Markets BD Senior Associate role calls for an established capital markets business development professional. You’re highly motivated, a self-starter, have a strong entrepreneurial mindset and conviction in decentralized finance.  The successful candidate will likely have 4+ years experience in capital markets, private credit, investment banking, hedge funds, private equity, or similar roles, in which they've built a track record of closing transactions and producing actionable recommendations through independent insights and analysis. You’ll join the Sales Director and wider Business Development team in playing an integral role driving new lender and borrower opportunities in the TradFi and DeFi space. In this role you will be required to communicate persuasively with external stakeholders and coordinate with team members from each area of the business to continuously improve conversion cycles and actively grow Maple’s TVL. You will also be comfortable with working autonomously, executing on strategies for new and existing business outreach initiatives, identifying market opportunities and managing the full sales life cycle from outreach to onboarding for new Maple clients.  Last but not Least! With our current 7 lending pools collectively having almost $1B in TVL across the Ethereum and Solana applications, and further pools imminent, now is the time to join the most exciting project in DeFi. Since our launch in 2021 we've been building strong partnerships with Circle, Alameda Research, Framework, Polychain, Wintermute, Orthogonal Trading, Maven 11, BlockTower, Celcius, X-Margin and more. Having found product-market fit, Maple is focused on growth in 2022 and aims to reach $5BN in TVL by year end.  If you subscribe to the values of Maple - Personal Ownership, Focused Execution, User Prioritisation, Innovative Mindset - and want to be part of a collaborative culture focused on bringing Global Finance into the future, then we want to hear from you! We look forward to receiving your application and will be in touch after having a chance to review.  In the meantime, here are some links to more information about Maple to help you check us out: https:www.maple.finance https:maplefinance.gitbook.iomaple https:github.commaple-labs https:twitter.commaplefinance?s=11 https:discord.cominvite9WdQHNp9Ja
title: Capital Markets Senior Associate

description: Are you the person to complete our team? At Dynasty Studios we offer a highly creative and ambitious workspace, with flexible working hours and opportunities for career growth. As our future employee, you will be joining a flat-structured environment with a casual dress code and be surrounded by open and talented colleagues in a social space that offers after-work social gatherings and events for every taste. Here at Dynasty Studios, we value every employee and their individual and unique contributions in the making of our highly engaging games. DESCRIPTION   Dynasty Studios is looking for a passionate and sharp Talent Acquisition Manager to join and drive the expansion of our studio. As our Talent Acquisition Manager, your role will be focused on finding and recruiting new potential hires and use your talent to understand and match the specific needs for our growing organization. The ideal candidate must be able to manage and prioritize people operations in a fast-growing game studio environment. WHAT WE OFFER •  To join an international, talented team of ambitious colleagues. • An opportunity to be part of a company in rapid growth  •  A casual work environment with room for growth and development •  Work-life balance •  Daily lunch, fruit, tea, and coffee •  Social gatherings in after work hours and yearly social events • Relocation assistance ABOUT DYNASTY STUDIOS At Dynasty Studios we create next-generation games! We strive to lead the mass adoption of blockchain technology through never before seen gameplay experiences. With our established team of veteran game developers, our team at Dynasty has several projects in the pipeline designed with the goal of uniting the blockchain and gaming communities. Our upcoming franchise of high-quality games will operate within a shared universe of playable NFTs and in-game economies that will open up new dimensions of gameplay through true digital ownership and player-driven experiences.

With the support of more senior members of the company you would be expected to further develop your skills and knowledge, while at the same time helping to mentor then members of the team. Gamium is building the first decentralized social metaverse and the digital identity of humans. Create your avatar, exchange NFTs, get a job, socialize and earn in the Gamium world. description: About Aldrin Labs There is a steep learning curve when it comes to crypto. Only once overcome will we have mass adoption. Aldrin Labs aims to debunk the belief that decentralized finance is inherently complex and separate from centralized finance. We will amend the frustratingly poor user experience and fragmentation that millions of crypto natives and newcomers face. We will seamlessly merge the centralized and decentralized world. Aldrin Labs aims to be purposeful. We strive to halve the fifty working years of the average person. This is the mission of Aldrin Labs. Aldrin Labs has Aldrin DEX and is incubating an innovative crypto wallet and money market. These protocols will integrate with each other to provide easy functionality and purposefully help people achieve financial freedom. Aldrin Labs is well funded ($8M) and aggressively looking to expand our 30+ employee count. Aldrin Labs is a fully remote company. We are interested in capturing the best talent, no matter where you live. The Role We’re looking for a Performance Marketing Manager to lead performance marketing efforts for Aldrin´s products with focus on its crypto wallet app. You will work under the guidance of the Chief Marketing Office to: Lead the planning and execution of our performance efforts paid distribution campaigns to optimize Aldrin conversionsdrive users across paid marketing channels. Manage the development of new marketing materials across Paid Search, Display, Paid Social, Programmatic Display, Content Marketing, Retargeting, Paid Social, and Affiliates. Develop creative briefs and copy and manage approvals using ClickUp andor other project management tools. Own the marketing calendar and secure alignment with the design and marketing team members. Manage campaign reporting and regularly report on ongoing paid media performance and use data to inform future growth, optimization and creative briefs. Manage monthly invoice process with finance ensuring accurate and timely submissions. Create presentations to report on performance and progress to senior leadership and other stakeholders. Minimum Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in performance marketing andor growth marketing (preferably in the Fintech or Gambling Industry). Extensive understanding of Google, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, TikTok and DSP paid ecosystems and how marketers can use tools, data and operations to maximize performance success. Proven history of running effective paid marketing campaigns across multiple platforms. Extensive experience with execution, reporting, and optimizations to inform planning. Social and digital media savvy, up to date with current digital trends and the competitive landscape. Advanced expertise in Excel (pivot tables, advanced formulas, etc.) and PowerPointGoogle Slides.
